59 template <class PointType>
60 void cloudUtilities<PointType>::meanFilter(pcl::PointCloud<PointType> &res){
61  if(_queue.isEmpty()) return;
62  typename pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr tempC (new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>());
63  _queue.dequeue(*tempC);
64  int width = tempC->width;
65  int height = tempC->height;
66  std::vector<float> conf(width*height, 0);
67  std::vector<float> mnCounter(width*height, 0);
68  std::vector<float> addX(width*height, 0);
69  std::vector<float> addY(width*height, 0);
70  std::vector<float> addZ(width*height, 0);
71  std::vector<float> ampt(width*height, 0);
72  //Point_Cloud sum;
73 
74  res.width = width;
75  res.height = height;
76  while (!_queue.isEmpty()){
77  int i = 0;
78  for(int i = 0; i < tempC->points.size(); i++){
79  if(!std::isnan(tempC->points[i].z)){
80  addX[i] += tempC->points[i].x;
81  addY[i] += tempC->points[i].y;
82  addZ[i] += tempC->points[i].z;
83  ampt[i] += tempC->points[i].intensity;
84  mnCounter[i] +=1;
85  }else{
86  conf[i] = 1;
87  mnCounter[i] = 0;
88  }
89  }
90  _queue.dequeue(*tempC);
91  }
92  for(int i = 0; i < mnCounter.size(); i++){
93  PointType temPoint;
94  if(mnCounter[i] == 0){
95  temPoint.x = NAN;
96  temPoint.y = NAN;
97  temPoint.z = NAN;
98  temPoint.intensity = NAN;
99  }else{
100  temPoint.x = addX[i] / mnCounter[i];
101  temPoint.y = addY[i] / mnCounter[i];
102  temPoint.z = addZ[i] / mnCounter[i];
103  temPoint.intensity = ampt[i] / mnCounter[i];
104  }
105  res.points.push_back(temPoint);
106  }
107 }
108 
109 template <class PointType>
110 void cloudUtilities<PointType>::outlineRemover(const boost::shared_ptr< const pcl::PointCloud<PointType>> blob,
111  int width, int height, float perW, float perH,
112  pcl::PointCloud<PointType> &res)
113 {
114  int hLower = (height*perH)/2;
115  int hUpper = (height - hLower);
116  int wLower = (width*perW)/2;
117  int wUpper = width - wLower;
118  int pCounter = 0;
119  //res.width = width-wLower-wUpper;
120  //res.height = height-hLower-hUpper;
121  for(int i = 0; i < height; i++){
122  std::vector<float> tempX;
123  std::vector<float> tempY;
124  std::vector<float> tempZ;
125  std::vector<float> tempA;
126  for(int j = 0; j < width; j++){
127  if((i > hLower & i < hUpper) & (j > wLower & j < wUpper)){
128  tempX.push_back(blob->points[pCounter].x);
129  tempY.push_back(blob->points[pCounter].y);
130  tempZ.push_back(blob->points[pCounter].z);
131  tempA.push_back(blob->points[pCounter].intensity);
132  pCounter ++;
133  }else pCounter ++;
134  }
135  if((i > hLower & i < hUpper)){
136  for(int i = 0; i < tempX.size(); i++){
137  PointType temP;
138  temP.x = tempX[i];
139  temP.y = tempY[i];
140  temP.z = tempZ[i];
141  temP.intensity = tempA[i];
142  res.points.push_back(temP);
143  }
144  }
145  }
146  res.width = res.points.size();
147  res.height = 1;
148 }
